# R Commands for Generating 

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/nutriverse/riycf/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/nutriverse/riycf/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package aims to generate updated indicators to assess infant and young 
child feeding (IYCF) practices at the household level. The indicators were 
developed using the technical guideline from [the Indicators for assessing infant and young child feeding practices: definitions and measurement methods](https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/9789240018389).
